alert.note: Alert for Amite; Pike (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 9:59PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern St. Helena and northwestern Tangipahoa Parishes, southwestern Pike and southeastern Amite Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 958 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kentwood, or 10 miles northeast of Greensburg, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kentwood, Osyka and Tangipahoa. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 56 and 66. Interstate 55 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 7. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
